contextId.information: Possible meanings are 1) this is the prophet speaking (see UDB) or 2)  Yahweh is speaking. AT: "I myself have rejected your calf, Samaria" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_123person]])
contextId.quote: Your calf has been rejected, Samaria

contextId.information: Here "they" still refers to the people of Israel. You can continue stating this is second person. AT: "if you escape" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_123person]])
